mapper.sql: cpy.cpy_name AS cpyName, cpy.cpy_telephone AS cpyTelephone, cpy.cpy_brand AS cpyBrand, ccp.cbs_operator AS ccpName, ccp.cbs_operator_phone AS ccpTelephone, cpy.cpy_email AS ccpEmail, ccp.cbs_operator_qq AS ccpQq
mapper.select:
SELECT id , cdl_name AS cdlName, cdl_telephone AS cdlTelephone, cdl_province AS cdlProvince, cdl_city AS cdlCity, cdl_county AS cdlCounty, cdl_address AS cdlAddress, cdl_x AS cdlX, cdl_y AS cdlY, cdl_img1 AS cdlImg1, cdl_img2 AS cdlImg2, cdl_img3 AS cdlImg3, cdl_img4 AS cdlImg4, cdl_img5 AS cdlImg5, cdl_createtime AS cdlCreatetime, cdl_createuse AS cdlCreateuse, cdl_is_through AS cdlIsThrough, cdl_through_time AS cdlThroughTime, cdl_through_user AS cdlThroughUser, cdl_is_del_status AS cdlIsDelStatus, cdl_price AS cdlPrice, cdl_special_price AS cdlSpecialPrice, cdl_special_name AS cdlSpecialName, cdl_level AS cdlLevel, cpy_id AS cpyId, cdl_sort AS cdlSort, cdl_notice AS cdlNotice, cdl_introduce AS cdlIntroduce, cdl_open_time AS cdlOpenTime, cdl_close_time AS cdlCloseTime, cdl_reason AS cdlReason, cdl_eat_people AS cdlEatPeople, cdl_stop_car AS cdlStopCar, cdl_internet AS cdlInternet, cdl_business AS cdlBusiness, cdl_order_norme AS cdlOrderNorme, cdl_order_normz AS cdlOrderNormz, cdl_receive_num AS cdlReceiveNum, cdl_cdlInland AS cdlInland, cdl_external AS cdlExternal, cdl_foreign AS cdlForeign, cdl_foreigncity AS cdlForeignCity, cdl_code AS cdlCode, cdl_people_qq AS cdlPeopleQq, cdl_phone AS cdlPhone, cdl_district AS cdlDistrict, cdl_unlimited AS cdlUnlimited, cdl_special AS cdlSpecial, cdl_scheduled AS cdlScheduled
FROM cafeteria_detail WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id , cdl_name AS cdlName, cdl_telephone AS cdlTelephone, cdl_province AS cdlProvince, cdl_city AS cdlCity, cdl_county AS cdlCounty, cdl_address AS cdlAddress, cdl_x AS cdlX, cdl_y AS cdlY, cdl_img1 AS cdlImg1, cdl_img2 AS cdlImg2, cdl_img3 AS cdlImg3, cdl_img4 AS cdlImg4, cdl_img5 AS cdlImg5, cdl_createtime AS cdlCreatetime, cdl_createuse AS cdlCreateuse, cdl_is_through AS cdlIsThrough, cdl_through_time AS cdlThroughTime, cdl_through_user AS cdlThroughUser, cdl_is_del_status AS cdlIsDelStatus, cdl_price AS cdlPrice, cdl_special_price AS cdlSpecialPrice, cdl_special_name AS cdlSpecialName, cdl_level AS cdlLevel, cpy_id AS cpyId, cdl_sort AS cdlSort, cdl_notice AS cdlNotice, cdl_introduce AS cdlIntroduce, cdl_open_time AS cdlOpenTime, cdl_close_time AS cdlCloseTime, cdl_reason AS cdlReason, cdl_eat_people AS cdlEatPeople, cdl_stop_car AS cdlStopCar, cdl_internet AS cdlInternet, cdl_business AS cdlBusiness, cdl_order_norme AS cdlOrderNorme, cdl_order_normz AS cdlOrderNormz, cdl_receive_num AS cdlReceiveNum, cdl_cdlInland AS cdlInland, cdl_external AS cdlExternal, cdl_foreign AS cdlForeign, cdl_foreigncity AS cdlForeignCity, cdl_code AS cdlCode, cdl_people_qq AS cdlPeopleQq, cdl_phone AS cdlPhone, cdl_district AS cdlDistrict, cdl_unlimited AS cdlUnlimited, cdl_special AS cdlSpecial, cdl_scheduled AS cdlScheduled FROM cafeteria_detail
ORDER BY cdl_is_del_status DESC, cdl_createtime DESC

SELECT town.* FROM ( SELECT cafeteria.id AS id, cdl_name AS cdlName, cdl_telephone AS cdlTelephone, cdl_province AS cdlProvince, cdl_city AS cdlCity, cdl_county AS cdlCounty, cdl_address AS cdlAddress, cdl_x AS cdlX, cdl_y AS cdlY, cdl_img1 AS cdlImg1, cdl_img2 AS cdlImg2, cdl_img3 AS cdlImg3, cdl_img4 AS cdlImg4, cdl_img5 AS cdlImg5, cdl_createtime AS cdlCreatetime, cdl_createuse AS cdlCreateuse, cdl_is_through AS cdlIsThrough, cdl_through_time AS cdlThroughTime, cdl_through_user AS cdlThroughUser, cdl_is_del_status AS cdlIsDelStatus, cdl_price AS cdlPrice, cdl_special_price AS cdlSpecialPrice, cdl_special_name AS cdlSpecialName, cdl_level AS cdlLevel, cdl_sort AS cdlSort, cdl_notice AS cdlNotice, cdl_introduce AS cdlIntroduce, cdl_open_time AS cdlOpenTime, cdl_close_time AS cdlCloseTime, cdl_reason AS cdlReason, cdl_eat_people AS cdlEatPeople, cdl_stop_car AS cdlStopCar, cdl_internet AS cdlInternet, cdl_business AS cdlBusiness, cdl_order_norme AS cdlOrderNorme, cdl_order_normz AS cdlOrderNormz, cdl_receive_num AS cdlReceiveNum, cdl_cdlInland AS cdlInland, cdl_external AS cdlExternal, cdl_foreign AS cdlForeign, cdl_foreigncity AS cdlForeignCity, cdl_code AS cdlCode, cdl_people_qq AS cdlPeopleQq, cdl_phone AS cdlPhone, cdl_district AS cdlDistrict, cdl_unlimited AS cdlUnlimited, cdl_special AS cdlSpecial,
(SELECT a.cpc_trade_price FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcTradePrice,
(SELECT a.cpc_sign FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcSign,
(SELECT a.cpc_is_sign FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_is_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcIsSign,
(SELECT a.cpe_id FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_is_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpeId,
cdl_scheduled AS cdlScheduled,
,( SELECT group_concat(cafeteria_voucher_price.cvp_price_town) FROM cafeteria_voucher_price WHERE djq_id in ( select id from cafeteria_voucher where cafeteria_voucher.id = cafeteria_voucher_price.djq_id and cafeteria.id = cafeteria_voucher.cdl_ID ) ) cvpPriceTown, ( SELECT group_concat(cafeteria_voucher_price.cvp_price_total) FROM cafeteria_voucher_price WHERE djq_id in ( select id from cafeteria_voucher where cafeteria_voucher.id = cafeteria_voucher_price.djq_id and cafeteria.id = cafeteria_voucher.cdl_ID ) ) cvpPriceTotal FROM cafeteria_detail cafeteria LEFT JOIN company_detail cpy ON cafeteria.cpy_id = cpy.id LEFT JOIN company_business ccp ON ccp.cpy_id = cafeteria.cpy_id WHERE cdl_is_del_status = '1' AND cafeteria.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'CAFETERIA' ) AND
) town WHERE town.cpcTradePrice is not null ORDER BY cpcIsSign DESC, cpcSign DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT cafeteria.id AS id, cdl_name AS cdlName, cdl_telephone AS cdlTelephone, cdl_province AS cdlProvince, cdl_city AS cdlCity, cdl_county AS cdlCounty, cdl_address AS cdlAddress, cdl_x AS cdlX, cdl_y AS cdlY, cdl_img1 AS cdlImg1, cdl_img2 AS cdlImg2, cdl_img3 AS cdlImg3, cdl_img4 AS cdlImg4, cdl_img5 AS cdlImg5, cdl_createtime AS cdlCreatetime, cdl_createuse AS cdlCreateuse, cdl_is_through AS cdlIsThrough, cdl_through_time AS cdlThroughTime, cdl_through_user AS cdlThroughUser, cdl_is_del_status AS cdlIsDelStatus, cdl_price AS cdlPrice, cdl_special_price AS cdlSpecialPrice, cdl_special_name AS cdlSpecialName, cdl_level AS cdlLevel, cdl_sort AS cdlSort, cdl_notice AS cdlNotice, cdl_introduce AS cdlIntroduce, cdl_open_time AS cdlOpenTime, cdl_close_time AS cdlCloseTime, cdl_reason AS cdlReason, cdl_eat_people AS cdlEatPeople, cdl_stop_car AS cdlStopCar, cdl_internet AS cdlInternet, cdl_business AS cdlBusiness, cdl_order_norme AS cdlOrderNorme, cdl_order_normz AS cdlOrderNormz, cdl_receive_num AS cdlReceiveNum, cdl_cdlInland AS cdlInland, cdl_external AS cdlExternal, cdl_foreign AS cdlForeign, cdl_foreigncity AS cdlForeignCity, cdl_code AS cdlCode, cdl_people_qq AS cdlPeopleQq, cdl_phone AS cdlPhone, cdl_district AS cdlDistrict, cdl_unlimited AS cdlUnlimited, cdl_special AS cdlSpecial,
(SELECT a.cpc_trade_price FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcTradePrice,
(SELECT a.cpc_sign FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcSign,
(SELECT a.cpc_is_sign FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_is_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpcIsSign,
(SELECT a.cpe_id FROM ( SELECT cdl_id, cpe_id, cpc_sign, cpc_is_sign, cpc_trade_price FROM cafeteria_price WHERE cpc_date = #{cpcDate} AND cpc_is_open = '02' ORDER BY cpc_create_time DESC ) a WHERE a.cdl_id = cafeteria.id GROUP BY a.cpe_id ORDER BY a.cpc_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS cpeId,
cdl_scheduled AS cdlScheduled,
,( SELECT group_concat(cafeteria_voucher_price.cvp_price_town) FROM cafeteria_voucher_price WHERE djq_id in ( select id from cafeteria_voucher where cafeteria_voucher.id = cafeteria_voucher_price.djq_id and cafeteria.id = cafeteria_voucher.cdl_ID ) ) cvpPriceTown, ( SELECT group_concat(cafeteria_voucher_price.cvp_price_total) FROM cafeteria_voucher_price WHERE djq_id in ( select id from cafeteria_voucher where cafeteria_voucher.id = cafeteria_voucher_price.djq_id and cafeteria.id = cafeteria_voucher.cdl_ID ) ) cvpPriceTotal FROM cafeteria_detail cafeteria LEFT JOIN company_detail cpy ON cafeteria.cpy_id = cpy.id LEFT JOIN company_business ccp ON ccp.cpy_id = cafeteria.cpy_id WHERE cdl_is_del_status = '1' AND cafeteria.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'CAFETERIA' ) AND
) town WHERE town.cpcTradePrice is not null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafeteria_detail ( cdl_name, cdl_telephone, cdl_province, cdl_city, cdl_county, cdl_address, cdl_x, cdl_y, cdl_img1, cdl_img2, cdl_img3, cdl_img4, cdl_img5, cdl_createtime, cdl_createuse, cdl_price, cdl_special_price, cdl_special_name, cdl_level, cdl_is_del_status, cpy_id, cdl_sort, cdl_notice, cdl_introduce, cdl_open_time, cdl_close_time, cdl_reason, cdl_eat_people, cdl_stop_car, cdl_internet, cdl_business, cdl_order_norme, cdl_order_normz, cdl_receive_num, cdl_cdlInland, cdl_external, cdl_foreign, cdl_foreigncity, cdl_people_qq, cdl_phone, cdl_district, cdl_unlimited, cdl_special ) VALUES ( #{cdlName}, #{cdlTelephone}, #{cdlProvince}, #{cdlCity}, #{cdlCounty}, #{cdlAddress}, #{cdlX}, #{cdlY}, #{cdlImg1}, #{cdlImg2}, #{cdlImg3}, #{cdlImg4}, #{cdlImg5}, #{cdlCreatetime}, #{cdlCreateuse}, #{cdlPrice}, #{cdlSpecialPrice}, #{cdlSpecialName}, #{cdlLevel}, #{cdlIsDelStatus}, #{cpyId}, #{cdlSort}, #{cdlNotice}, #{cdlIntroduce}, #{cdlOpenTime}, #{cdlCloseTime}, #{cdlReason}, #{cdlEatPeople}, #{cdlStopCar}, #{cdlInternet}, #{cdlBusiness}, #{cdlOrderNorme}, #{cdlOrderNormz}, #{cdlReceiveNum}, #{cdlInland}, #{cdlExternal}, #{cdlForeign}, #{cdlForeignCity}, #{cdlPeopleQq}, #{cdlPhone}, #{cdlDistrict}, #{cdlUnlimited}, #{cdlSpecial} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cafeteria_detail SET cdl_name = #{cdlName}, cdl_telephone = #{cdlTelephone}, cdl_province = #{cdlProvince}, cdl_city = #{cdlCity}, cdl_county = #{cdlCounty}, cdl_address = #{cdlAddress}, cdl_x = #{cdlX}, cdl_y = #{cdlY}, cdl_img1 = #{cdlImg1}, cdl_img2 = #{cdlImg2}, cdl_img3 = #{cdlImg3}, cdl_img4 = #{cdlImg4}, cdl_img5 = #{cdlImg5}, cdl_price = #{cdlPrice}, cdl_special_price = #{cdlSpecialPrice}, cdl_special_name = #{cdlSpecialName}, cdl_level = #{cdlLevel}, cdl_sort = #{cdlSort}, cdl_notice = #{cdlNotice}, cdl_introduce = #{cdlIntroduce}, cdl_open_time = #{cdlOpenTime}, cdl_close_time = #{cdlCloseTime}, cdl_reason = #{cdlReason}, cdl_eat_people = #{cdlEatPeople}, cdl_stop_car = #{cdlStopCar}, cdl_internet = #{cdlInternet}, cdl_business = #{cdlBusiness}, cdl_order_norme = #{cdlOrderNorme}, cdl_order_normz = #{cdlOrderNormz}, cdl_receive_num = #{cdlReceiveNum}, cdl_cdlInland = #{cdlInland}, cdl_external = #{cdlExternal}, cdl_foreign = #{cdlForeign}, cdl_foreigncity = #{cdlForeignCity}, cdl_people_qq = #{cdlPeopleQq}, cdl_phone = #{cdlPhone}, cdl_district = #{cdlDistrict}, cdl_unlimited = #{cdlUnlimited}, cdl_createtime = #{cdlCreatetime}, cdl_special = #{cdlSpecial} WHERE id = #{id}
